title: Fire Escape Stairs
description:
98.5 The Sports Hub made some difficult personnel moves late last weekend (00:00:10). Kevin O'Leary calls Minifans bozos for asking about Christian Arcand (00:05:00). Chris Klemmer calls out Rico Bosco in an awkward exchange during the Mets livestream (00:32:10). Draymond Green's punch should get him a lot more than 5-7 games (00:20:50). We find an example of a vocal fry (00:31:00). Rico Bosco calls in from a miserable Mets stream & the guys discuss Red13 Studios stairs at length.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
